items.summary: Update the backend seeded dataset in `backend/main.mo` (`_initializeShops`) to include exactly one new Women-category clothing item that is a blue dress with a floral pattern, so that searching with category=Women, itemType="Dress", color="Blue", pattern="Floral" returns this item and `getItemDetails` for the item returns at least one shop in the shops list.

Add a new static clothing photo image file for the newly seeded Womenâ€™s blue floral dress under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and ensure it loads successfully via direct browser URL `/assets/generated/<filename>` without a 404.
